title: Cookies
description: Macadamia nuts & Blueberry and Chocolate Chips Cookies.
story:
This is real life saver recipe when it comes to unexpected guests visiting : ) very easy, very fast and usually made from ingredients that are at home all the time. And you may add literally anything you want in your cookies – my favorite Macadamia nuts and blueberries, my husband’s – chocolate chips : ).

Here is how I cook it.

ingredients.name: Your flavour
ingredients.preparationNotes: I divide dough in two: to one half add a handful of chocolate chips, and nuts and blueberries to the other.

instructions: Preheat your oven to 175 C (350 F).
Add salt, baking powder and vanilla, mix everything very well.
Start adding flour gradually, keep mixing.
Add your desired flavor, incorporate it to the dough.
Make cookies. I like big ones, so from this amount of ingredients I get 12 cookies.
Leave to cool down on a rack.
